content: SPX Epoxy Diamond Cup Wheel (For DG/DGH 150) Ultimate diamond cup wheel for the DG/DGH 150 diamond grinder – for removing thick coatings such as epoxy ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Diamond blades and cup wheels- - - ### FEATURES:Features Fast removal of thick coatings due to polycrystalline diamond (PCD) technology Long lifetime thanks to special protective segments Very high material removal rate on plastic and sticky coatings Low vibration thanks to advanced core balancing technology Engineered for reliability – highest-grade materials used throughout Applications Removing thick coatings such as polyurethane, epoxy, plastics ### TECHNICAL DATA: Tool type: Concrete grinder DG/DGH 150 Base material: Polyurethane, Epoxy, Plastic Product Class: Ultimate Technical Data | Tool type | Concrete grinder DG/DGH 150 | Base material | Polyurethane, Epoxy, Plastic | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2307910 - Diamond cup wheel 6 SPX epoxy - Package Size 1 pc
